lines.name: Richmond-Millbrae
lines.description: The Red Line connects Richmond in the East Bay to Millbrae on the Peninsula, passing through downtown Oakland and San Francisco via the Transbay Tube.

lines.name: Antioch-SFO/Millbrae
lines.description: The Yellow Line provides service from Antioch in eastern Contra Costa County to San Francisco International Airport and Millbrae, serving the East Bay hills communities.

lines.name: Dublin/Pleasanton-Daly City
lines.description: The Blue Line connects the Tri-Valley area in the East Bay to Daly City on the Peninsula, serving downtown Oakland and San Francisco.

lines.name: Berryessa-Daly City
lines.description: The Green Line extends BART service to Silicon Valley, connecting Berryessa/North San Jose to Daly City through the Fremont corridor.

lines.name: Richmond-Berryessa
lines.description: The Orange Line provides a direct connection between Richmond and Silicon Valley, running through downtown Oakland and the Fremont corridor.

lines.name: Oakland Airport Connector
lines.description: The Oakland Airport Connector is an automated people mover connecting the Coliseum BART station to Oakland International Airport.
